function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus from humans to humans through infectious droplets","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, social distancing, and proper ventilation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C disinfection","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, building owners"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic patients with COVID-19 releasing infectious droplets","Impact":"Unidentified spread of the virus due to lack of symptoms in infected individuals","Mitigation":"Regular testing, isolation of symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, individuals"},{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 virus remaining infectious on surfaces and in indoor air","Impact":"Increased risk of indirect transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection, improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"Disinfectant sprayers, air purifiers, HVAC upgrades","People":"General population, building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, government"}]}
